definition: power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: Water Proof Switch, Used for electric kettle, Washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 防水开关，用于电水壶，洗衣机。

sentences.english: Design of a switch, when to switch, the program re-entering the main requirement.
sentences.chinese: 设计一个开关，当进行切换后，程序再进入主要要求。

sentences.english: Turn the dc meters switch to TR1.
Can also be provided with a by-pass switch, model 8150.
sentences.chinese: 在8150型上还可以配置旁路开关。

sentences.english: When the Q-Switch is off (closed), there is no power whatsoever being transmitted from the laser.
sentences.chinese: 当Q开关关断时，激光器中就没有功率传输。

sentences.english: The main option I focus on in this article is the inline editor switch.
sentences.chinese: 本文将重点讲述的主要选项是行内编辑器开关。

sentences.english: The directional signal switch is installed just below the hub of the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 转向开关就安装在转向柱毂的下面。

sentences.english: But what if the process included 10 switches and solenoids?
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果这一进程包括了10个开关和螺线管？

sentences.english: HCU's input and output signal is mainly analog or on-off quantity.
sentences.chinese: HCU的输入输出信号主要是模拟量和开关量。

sentences.english: A spark gap is one of key devices of pulsed power technology.
sentences.chinese: 气体开关是高重复频率脉冲功率技术的关键技术。

sentences.english: A novel magnetic-field sensitive switch is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型的磁敏开关。

sentences.english: Foot switch board has quick lowering function when unload.
sentences.chinese: 脚踏开关板具备空载快速下降功能。

sentences.english: Tailor-made dynamic contact resistance of gold hit the brake trigger switch, a permanent warranty.
sentences.chinese: 黄金接点特制耐动击刹车触发开关，永久保用。

sentences.english: Put all the control switches on the position "off".
sentences.chinese: 将所有主令开关放在“断”的位置。

sentences.english: Quad, Rail-to-Rail, fault-protected, SPST analog switch.
sentences.chinese: 轨到轨，故障保护，SPST模拟开关。

sentences.english: The strength of the stove firepower can be adjusted by the switch on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 灶头火力大小可通过调节灶头开关，任意调节。

definition: bolt (for locking a window, cabinet etc)/(electrical) plug
to press down/to press a button
to set up an electric circuit/to electrify/to switch on/to be connected to an electricity grid/open telegram
electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
